metadata.Title: CVE-2018-9240 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
ncmpc through 0.29 is prone to a NULL pointer dereference flaw. If a user uses the chat screen and another client sends a long chat message, a crash and denial of service could occur.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2018-9240` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

ncmpc - 0.33-2
ncmpc-lyrics - 0.33-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ncmpc package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.33-2').
